changelog:
*- BeastROMs v.1.1
- New own bootanimation (thx to @SerJo87)
- Added updated Google Feed lib from Pixel3 launcher
- Added 5th number row to keyboard
- Animation of switching between the power menu and the extended power menu
- Rework QS columns and rows count config
- Added back QS hide label
- Added Reboot/Recovery QS Tile
- QS auto brightness toggle rework
- Only show bluetooth icon when connected && enabled
- Removed not working switches from statusbar tuner
- Improve system stability and performance
